lessons.name: R-L Distinction
lessons.description: A list of vocabulary words designed to help you distinguish between R and L

lessons.name: N-Ng Distinction
lessons.description: A list of vocabulary words designed to help you distinguish between -n and -ng sounds

lessons.name: Ut-At Distinction
lessons.description: A list of vocabulary words designed to help you distinguish between A and U sounds in the middle of words

lessons.name: Eat-It Distinction
lessons.description: A list of vocabulary words designed to help you distinguish between Eat and It sounds

lessons.name: S-Z Distinction
lessons.description: A list of vocabulary words designed to help you distinguish between S and Z sounds

lessons.name: T-D Distinction
lessons.description: A list of vocabulary words designed to help you distinguish between T and D sounds
